testcase.classname: Feature to test the login functionality of Zero Banking Application.
testcase.name: Check signin button exists on Home Page
testcase.system-out: Given User launch the browser...............................................passed When User open the Zero Banking Application.................................passed Then Signin button should be displayed......................................passed

testcase.classname: Feature to test the login functionality of Zero Banking Application.
testcase.name: Login successful with valid credentials
testcase.system-out: Given User launch the browser...............................................passed And User open the Zero Banking Application..................................passed And click Signin button on home page of application.........................passed When User enter username and password.......................................passed And User click on Signin button.............................................passed Then User should be redirected to the home page of user.....................passed

testcase.name: Logged in User should be able to logout
testcase.system-out: Given User click the username dropdown......................................passed When User click the LogOut button...........................................passed Then User should be redirect to the home page of zero banking application...passed
